https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6D1oqvTbfPz9kbZkgLLxhlY2lcf.jpg Images from the bridge over Canal Saint-Martin in Paris. The inland waterway vessels Rose and Pluie de roses pass each other. Changes pile up and the camera unravels them, through shooting, for a mise en abyme of the fall. A Rain of Roses (To Rose Lowder)
